briefTitle: Evaluation of Geriatric Questionnaires to Predict Toxicities of CDK 4/6 Inhibitors in Older Breast Cancer Patients?
officialTitle: Evaluation of the G8 Questionnaire and the Groningen Frailty Indicator to Predict Toxicities of CDK 4/6 Inhibitors in Older Breast Cancer Patients?
conditions: Can the Geriatric Questionnaires Predict Adverse Effects in Geriatric Breast Cancer Patients Treated With Cyclin-dependent Kinase 4 and 6 Inhibitors
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Breast cancer 65 years and older Treated with CDK 4/6 inhibitors (Palbociclib or Ribociclib)

Exclusion Criteria:

* Below 65 years old
